title: Pu**y on the Hip (with Yassir Lester) RE-RELEASE
itunes:title: Pu**y on the Hip (with Yassir Lester) RE-RELEASE
description:
Langston leaves a special message for the listeners at home and invites you to enjoy this re-release episode with Yassir Lester! Rate and review My Momma Told Me on Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/my-momma-told-me-with-langston-kerman/id1523712290

Email your drops and conspiracy theories to mymommapod@gmail.com

Are Ciara and Usher intersex? Langston and his guest Yassir Lester (Black Monday on Showtime) work to figure it out. Also, they do their absolute best not to get canceled.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
